title: 9 memorable moments in New Brunswick
description: How could you forget walking on the ocean floor? The post 9 moments you’ll remember forever from your trip to New Brunswick appeared first on Matador Network.
content: New Brunswick is one of Canada s oldest and smallest provinces and one of my personal favorites It was here that I spent my formative years playing on beaches eating fiddleheads scouting for whales and exploring the ocean floor at low tide Now that I m chars
